title: The War of the Words
content:
This new project ( [http://slashrun.org/War](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016090300/http:/slashrun.org/War)) can be described as an alternative news visualization engine

Keywords: real-time, 3d, participative, text...

I thought it could be of interest here, participation and/or feedback would be great.

Ariel  
 [http://chronotext.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016090300/http:/chronotext.org/)
author: arielm
